name: Letters From A Desolate Place
description:
Midterm Project I did for Intro To Game Programming Class during the Spring 2022 Semester At Bloomfield College. You play as a No-Named Protagonist looking for your Lost Brother in a Desolate Place through a First-Person Perspective. During your journey you will encounter puzzles and the dead bodies of those who use to live there with scattered notes to tell their story.

Controls:

Move - "WASD"

Jump - "Spacebar"

Sprint - "Shift"

Flashlight - "F"
